content.rendered:
‘Sharing video’s safely’

On a secure video platform with entrances for different types of viewers, educational institution Deltion College can now hold an open house 365 days of the year.

Jan-Ernst van Driel, director of Deltion College: “The possibilities of the video platform technology from Tradecast are almost endless for us. Having our own platform with our own CMS and the link to our website and social media is ideal.”

From students,
for students

With their own video platform Deltion TV, educational institution Deltion College is able to share videos with students within a safe, controlled environment. The students themselves also play an important role in the creation of the videos: the video platform allows students to master the entire production process, from coming up with a concept to publishing a video on Deltion TV.
